name: A pair of golden armbands
data: It increases the users wisdom magnificently.
It has low armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'greater vulnerability'.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'dispel magic'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
